SCRIPT.MSCRI: :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_YAML_UPDATED_YAML# = "" :SET &FLAG# = 0 :SET &SEARCH_START_STR# = "UPDATED_YAML::==========" :SET &SEARCH_END_STR# = "========================" :IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP") : PROCESS &HND# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : IF &FLAG# EQ 0 : SET &FLAG# = STR_FIND(&VALUE#, &SEARCH_START_STR#) : ELSE : SET &READ_END_FLAG# = STR_FIND(&VALUE#, &SEARCH_END_STR#) : IF &READ_END_FLAG# NE 0 : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : SET &NL# = UC_CRLF() : SET &UC4RB_YAML_UPDATED_YAML# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YAML_UPDATED_YAML#,"&VALUE#&NL#") : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF :SET &UC4RB_YAML_UPDATED_YAML# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_YAML_UPDATED_YAML#) :PUBLISH &UC4RB_YAML_UPDATED_YAML#,,"WORKFLOW"
